title: Realization of Reference-frame-independent Measurement-Device-independent quantum key distribution (University of Science and Technology of China)
text: ( Source : University of Science and Technology of China ) The Research group of Prof. GUO Guangcan from the Key Laboratory of Quantum Information , CAS made great progress in the quantum key distribution. Researcher YIN Zhenqiang, WANG Shuang,
